fullText: This musical adaptation of John Waters's 1990 movie about juvenile delinquents in 1950s Baltimore is so busy trying to be outrageous that it forgets to be entertaining.
dtliExcerpt: This musical adaptation of John Waters's 1990 movie about juvenile delinquents in 1950s Baltimore is so busy trying to be outrageous that it forgets to be entertaining.
